TalentsTiers.Name: Divinity
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases all healing done by your holy spells and all holy healing effects on you by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Divine Strength
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your total Strength by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Stoicism
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the duration of all Stun effects by an additional [@value]% and reduces the chance your Paladin helpful spells and damage over time effects will be dispelled by an additional [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Guardians Favor
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Hand of Protection by [@value] sec and increases the duration of your Hand of Freedom by [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Anticipation
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to dodge by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Divine Sacrifice
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant
2 min cooldown

30% off all damage taken by party members within 30 yards is redirected to the paladin (up to a maximum of 40% of the Paladin's health times the number of party members). Damage which reduces the Paladin below 20% health will break the effect. Lasts 10 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Righteous Fury
TalentsTiers.Description: While Righteous Fury is active, all damage taken is reduced by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Toughness
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your armor value from items by [@value]% and increases threat generated from all skills by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Divine Guardian
TalentsTiers.Description: When Divine Sacrifice is activated, your party and raid members within [@value] yards take  [@value2]% reduced damage for [@value3] sec. In addition, increases the duration of your Sacred Shield by [@value4]% and the amount absorbed by [@value5]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Hammer of Justice
TalentsTiers.Description: Decreases the cooldown of your Hammer of Justice spell by [@value] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Devotion Aura
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the armor bonus of your Devotion Aura by [@value]% and increases the amount healed on any target affected by Devotion Aura by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Blessing of Sanctuary
TalentsTiers.Description:
5% of base mana
30 yd range

Instant Cast
Places a Blessing on the friendly target, reducing damage taken from all sources by 3% for 10 min and increasing strenght and stamina by 10%. In addition, when the target blocks, parries, or dodges a melee attack the target will gain 2% of the maximum displayed mana. Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

TalentsTiers.Name: Reckoning
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives you a [@value]% chance after being hit by any damaging attack that the next [@value2] weapon swings within [@value3] sec will generate an additional attack.

TalentsTiers.Name: Sacred Duty
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your total Stamina by [@value2]%, reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield spell by [@value] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: One-Handed Weapon Specialization
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases all damage you deal when a one-handed melee weapon is equipped by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Spiritual Attunement
TalentsTiers.Description: A passive ability that gives you mana when healed by other friendly target spells. The amount of mana gained is equal to [@value]% of the amount healed.

TalentsTiers.Name: Holy Shield
TalentsTiers.Description:
7% of base mana
Instant Cast
8 sec cooldown

Requires Shields
Increases chance to block by 30% for 10 sec and deals 211 Holy damage for each attack blocked while active. Each block expends a charge. 8 charges.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Ardent Defender
TalentsTiers.Description: Damage taken that takes you below [@value]% health, is reduced by [@value2]%. In addition, attacks that would otherwise kill you have a [@value3]% chance to heal you by up to [@value4]% of your maximum  health (amount healed based on defense). This healing effect cannot occur more often than once every [@value5] min.

TalentsTiers.Name: Redoubt
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your block value by [@value]% and damaging melee and ranged attacks against you have a [@value2]% chance to increase your chance to block by [@value3]%.  Lasts [@value4] sec or [@value5] blocks.

TalentsTiers.Name: Combat Expertise
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your expertise by [@value], total Stamina and chance to critically hit by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Touched by the Light
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your spell power by an amount equal to [@value]% of your Strength and increases the amount healed by your critical heals by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Avengers Shield
TalentsTiers.Description:
20% of base mana
30 yd range

Instant Cast
30 sec cooldown

Hurls a holy shield at the enemy, dealing 376 to 450 Holy damage, Dazing them and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets. Lasts 10 sec.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Guarded by the Light
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces spell damage taken by [@value3]% and gives a [@value]% chance to refresh the duration of Divine Plea when you hit an enemy. In addition , your Divine Plea spell is [@value2]% less likely to be dispelled.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shield of the Templar
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces all damage taken by [@value2]% and grants your Avengers Shield a [@value]% chance to silence your targets for [@value3] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Judgements of the Just
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Hammer of Justice by [@value] sec, increases the duration of your Seal of Justce effect by [@value2] sec and your Judgement spells also reduce the melee attack speed of the target by [@value3]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Hammer of the Righteous
TalentsTiers.Description:
4% of base mana
Melee range

Instant Cast
6 sec cooldown

Requires One-Handed Melee Weapon
Hammer the current target and up to 2 additional nearby targets, causing 4 times your main hand damage per second as Holy damage.
